name: Solitaire by Funtime Games
description: Funtime Games LLC welcomes you to play the one and only Solitaire game meant for game-lovers of all kinds. This Solitaire card game brings everyone’s favorite classic to life with a deck full of all the fun that’s simple, quick, and easy to play. New and returning players are enjoying all that this exciting game has to offer, you don’t want to miss it.
